sentences.en: Blindside - from a set piece , ruck or maul , the short side of the field.
sentences.cn: 小边(也叫弱侧), 与大边(强侧)对应.

sentences.en: He was eager to get out of the ( common ) ruck and distinguish himself in some way.
sentences.cn: 他渴望出人头地,在某方面与众不同.

sentences.en: He was eager to get out of the ruck and distinguish himself in some way.
sentences.cn: 他渴望出人头地,在某方面与众不同.

sentences.en: His briliance raised him above the ruck.
sentences.cn: 他的才华使他从普通人群中脱颖而出.

sentences.en: His brilliance raised him above the ruck.
sentences.cn: 他的才华使他从人群中脱颖而出.

sentences.en: His designer suits ruck up round his middle.
sentences.cn: 他的名牌套装在腰部起了褶皱。

sentences.en: Ministers will find their budgets being decided in a political ruck with their colleagues.
sentences.cn: 部长们将发现他们的预算会在和同僚的政治纷争中敲定。

sentences.en: Ruck, however, agreed that the answer should not be perfunctory.
sentences.cn: 不过, 腊斯克倒是同意答复不应敷衍了事.

sentences.en: She saw marriage to him as a way out of the ruck.
sentences.cn: 她把同他结婚看作是出人头地的途径。

sentences.en: There'llbe a huge ruck with the cops as they try to take photographs.
sentences.cn: 他们试图拍照时将会和警察发生大规模的肢体冲突。

trans.tran_en: to become or make wrinkled, creased, or puckered
